articles.title: World Hepatitis Day 2024: Know causes, symptoms, treatment and preventive measures to stop liver inflammation - India TV News
articles.description: Learn about World Hepatitis Day 2024, including causes, symptoms, treatment, and preventive measures to stop liver inflammation. Stay informed to protect your liver and promote global health awareness.
articles.content: World Hepatitis Day is observed on July 28 every year to raise awareness about hepatitis and its impact on global health. Hepatitis is an inflammation of the liver caused by viral infections, toxic s… [+3211 chars]
